mapper.insert: insert into news_edit_contribution (ID, EDITOR_ID, CONTRIBUTION_ID, OPRATION, DISABLED, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_TIME, SUGGESTION) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{editorId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{contributionId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{opration,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{disabled,jdbcType=BIT}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{suggestion,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})
mapper.select: select ID, EDITOR_ID, CONTRIBUTION_ID, OPRATION, DISABLED, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_TIME, SUGGESTION from news_edit_contribution
